title: Businessweek Talks- Whole Foods CEO John Mackey
itunes:title: Businessweek Talks- Whole Foods CEO John Mackey
description:
John Mackey, CEO at Whole Foods Market, explains how the merger with Amazon enabled long-term thinking for the company, even though he doesn’t love everything about the arrangement. He speaks with Bloomberg Businessweek anchors Carol Massar and Jason Kelly in the latest edition of Businessweek Talks.

Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
